messages.title: UKIP - The Real Opposition
messages.content: Last June we made history by finishing second nationally at the European elections.

messages.title: UKIP: Ready to win here
messages.content: UKIP beat Labour and the Lib Dems across the whole country - proving that UKIP are no longer a minor party.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop paying the EU £45 million a day.
Control our borders Skilled migration not mass immigration.
A safer community Zero tolerance on crime.

mentions.partyLeader: Nigel Farage MEP, UK Independence Party.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop paying the EU £45 million a day.
issues.immigration: Control our borders Skilled migration not mass immigration.

endorsements.endorser: Nigel Farage MEP, UK Independence Party.
endorsements.endorsement: We have an excellent local candidate for the General Election.
